description: Russian prosecutors order checks at sensitive installations built on permafrost after a huge oil spill.
title: Arctic Circle oil spill: Russian prosecutors order checks at permafrost sites
title_page: Arctic Circle oil spill: Russian prosecutors order checks at permafrost sites - BBC News
maintext: A 2017 report to the Arctic Council, an international forum which includes Russia, warned that because of global warming and melting ice, foundations in permafrost regions could no longer support the loads they did as recently as the 1980s.
